content:
1. "Game Design Theory: A New Philosophy for Understanding Games" by Keith Burgun
2. "Designing Games: A Guide to Engineering Experiences" by Tynan Sylvester
3. "Challenges for Game Designers" by Brenda Brathwaite and Ian Schreiber
4. "Game Balancing" by Steve Rabin
5. "The Art of Game Design: A Book of Lenses" by Jesse Schell
6. "Level Up! The Guide to Great Video Game Design" by Scott Rogers
7. "The Game Design Reader: A Rules of Play Anthology" edited by Katie Salen and Eric Zimmerman
8. "The Game Maker's Apprentice: Game Development for Beginners" by Mark Overmars and Jacob Habgood
9. "Game Mechanics: Advanced Game Design" by Ernest Adams and Joris Dormans
10. "The Game Design Workshop: A Playcentric Approach to Creating Innovative Games" by Tracy Fullerton
